title: Fullstack Developer
bullets: Delivered a Next.js scheduling and employee management app for Calgary's largest food truck operator; served as team lead for 5 developers.
Developed API routes with role-based access control and schema-driven TypeScript types for I/O validation; implemented row-level security in PostgreSQL.
Designed and implemented constraint-based automated scheduling to replace manual workflows.
Configured GitHub Actions, Vercel, Jest, and ESLint to support automated deployments and local DX.
Contributed across product areas: UI implementation, tests, and sprint planning.
Authored training guides and led weekly demos to gather product feedback.

title: Fullstack Developer
